reviews.review: Melhor jogo de todos os tempos....insuperavel....

See I was dumb kid playing that TF2 free to play but when I see CSS and GMOD for sale for 10$. I couldn't pass  it up.. When I first bought CSS I played it for Zombie Mod but I found this mode called Minigames and ... JAILBREAK. Jailbreak, Zombie Mod, and Minigames to me are the only reasons I would get this game. But there is some competive like CSGO in there so I would recommened this game :).

You simply can't go wrong when you purchase a Valve game. Counter-Strike is a classic online multiplayer that sparked its genre to advocate more online gameplay from other games, such as the Killzones, the Halos and the Call of Duty games. With phenomenal gameplay that has a fun spin by having players purchase their own equipment and guns, Counter-Strike is among the best games ever.

Gameplay: 18/20 ... AWESOME (don't enjoy multiplayer like me? Play with bots! The AI is great with different difficulties and restrictions! ...But I'd really like more weapons)
Story: 0/0 ... OMITTED
Graphics: 5/5 ... PERFECT (I’d say 4/5 for a lack of lighting effects, but it’s so freakin’ old!)
Sound/Music: 5/5 ... PERFECT
Controls: 5/5 ... PERFECT

Overall: 94% (33/35) ... AWESOME

A classic first person shooting game with arugably still a great graphics engine. What keeps Counter strike Source going is the community. There are still plentty of servers to chose from. Amount of users are slowly shrinking, but there veteran and new users appearing on a daily basis.

Mega fun ... You should buy this one rather CS:GO 

           10/10

Este juego, sinceramente es para divertirse, no se puede jugar competitivamente, pero para pasar el rato con amigos, jugar y divertirte toda una madrugada es el mejor.
 No tendra muy buenos graficos, ni tampoco demasiadas actualizaciones despues del csgo, pero es el primer juego que jugue y es fantastico. en este juego he conocido gente la cual me amargo, y gente la cual sigue siendo amiga desde hace ya como 6 años o tal vez mas. es un juego el cual me hizo hasta re encontrar gente la cual iba conmigo a la escuela, o amigos los cuales habia olvidado.
 Recomiendo este juego simplemente por la buena vibra de algunos servidores. Aunque ya no quede tanta gente como antes, sigue siendo un buen juego.
Play this pro CS instead of the children paced Global Offensive.
Best FPS game and the best online game of all time!

There really isn't much of a reason to buy CSS unless you play Garry's Mod. If you're into FPS games, you're probably better off buying Counter Strike: Global Offensive since it's essentially the same game, but improved in virtually every way. Everything from graphics to gameplay mechanics are better, plus there's a lot more people playing CS:GO than CSS. I realize that CS:GO might cost a little more than this game, but it's worth the money if you enjoy these types of games.

I can't possibly recommend this game to anyone, unless they need the textures, models, and skins, to play certain gamemodes in Garry's Mod properly.
Por a sido siempre en nº1 de los FPS multijugador! Recomendadisimo!
